name: cobralize
description: Transform any human readable alphanumeric string divided by certain characters into underscore separated uppercase form.

scripts.rebuild: npm run build:support && npm run build:deploy
scripts.build: npm run pristine && npm run rebuild
scripts.build:test: npm run build:test:support && npm run build:test:deploy && npm run build:test:bridge
scripts.pretest: npm run clear && npm run rebuild && npm run build:test
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run build:test && npm run test:server && npm run test:client && npm run formal

author: Richeve S. Bebedor <richeve.bebedor@gmail.com>
